did.unittitle: Demos, Nickitas (Pseudonym: BELA). Behind The Blue Sky

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score, 1 submisson letter, 1 CD. Notes: Note on envelope: DN1.1 .WE. This piece was included in the same envelope with a CD of A Nonfunctional Teapot by Tim Reed, a CD of Blowout (expanded), Jam, and Still Transformations, and two CDs of Mirrored Pursuit by Benjamin Williams. .
